questions.question: Low resistances are provided with four terminals

answers.a: to eliminate the effect of thermo electric emfs
answers.b: to eliminate the effects of leads
answers.c: to fecilitate the connection of current and potential circuits
answers.d: in order that resistance value becomes definite irrespective of the nature of contacts at the current terminals

explanations.a: You have choosen option (a). The answer is incorrect. The correct option is (d).
explanations.b: You have choosen option (b). The answer is incorrect. The correct option is (d).
explanations.c: You have choosen option (c). The answer is incorrect. The correct option is (d).
explanations.d: You have choosen option (d). The answer is correct

questions.question: In a kelvin double bridge two sets of readings are taken when measuring a low resistance , one with the current in one direction and other with direction of current reversed. This is done to

answers.a: eliminate the effect of contact resistance
answers.b: eliminate the effect of thermo electric emfs
answers.c: eliminate the effect resistance of leads
answers.d: correct for changes in battery voltage

explanations.a: You have choosen option (a). The answer is incorrect. The correct option is (b).
explanations.b: You have choosen option (b). The answer is correct.
explanations.c: You have choosen option (c). The answer is incorrect. The correct option is (b).
explanations.d: You have choosen option (d). The answer is incorrect. The correct option is (b).
